overview: Serbia, autumn 1942, The SS has dispatched 200 men to the mountains to flush-out Commander Nikola Kalabic after receiving intelligence from a local informer of his whereabouts. The commander is accompanied by an elite unit of his Royal Mountain Corp troops.
tagline: BASED ON A TRUE STORY - COMMANDER NIKOLA KALABIC AND THE BATTLE AGAINST 200 GERMAN SS SOLDIERS
title: Besieged
